translations: n.搅拌器；搅拌用勺子；煽动者

sentences.sentence: You're gonna be a stirrer? - No one's listening to me!
sentences.translation: 你要做搅拌工了？ -没有人在听我说话！

sentences.sentence: Home Application: Vacuum cleaner, Stirrer, High speed fan.
sentences.translation: 家用电器：吸尘器，搅拌器，高速风扇。

sentences.sentence: You're not funny! You're going into honey. Our son, the stirrer !
sentences.translation: 你不要搞笑你要去搞蜂蜜我们的儿子蜂蜜搅拌工！
